to_address: "'Speakup is a screen review system for Linux.'" <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: need some help with Postfix
body:
Hi there,

Is anyone fairly good with Postfix this is my first time and I need to set
up the following things:

1.  I need to have mail sent from my Linux server which has Fedora 7 on it
to send messages from pilotalkmail.dyndns.biz out to the Internet I would
like to do that with end to end smtp if I could.
2. I would also like to set Postfix up so that I can have mailboxes for four
people on my server and forward their mail out to their regular address.
3.  I would also like to set up mailman for lists.  So I am assuming that
Postfix needs to be set up to receive and send both.

I would sure appreciate any help anyone has.

Scott
